nodes.text: The High Republic: The Fallen Star

The High Republic: The Fallen Star is an upcoming canon novel written by Claudia Gray as part of the multimedia project Star Wars: The High Republic. It is scheduled to be published by Del Rey on January 18, 2022.
In this gripping sequel to Star Wars: The Rising Storm, the light of the Jedi faces its darkest hour.
